revised_title: Magnetic Properties of Non-Stoichiometric Compounds: Antiferromagnetism and Ferrimagnetism
tldr: The authors study the magnetic properties of non-stoichiometric compounds, specifically antiferromagnetism and ferrimagnetism. They develop a theoretical treatment to understand the behavior of substances containing vacancies and discuss the experimental results for compounds like iron and chromium sulfides, selenides, and tellurides.
